newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - September 13.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - September 13.

text.p: The following stories were reported in Friday's Daily Variety:

HOLLYWOOD - Mark Canton, chairman of Sony Corp's Columbia TriStar Motion Picture Cos, is expected to leave his job Friday. Meanwhile, negotiations are said to have broken down with Arnold Rifkin, head of the William Morris Agency motion picture department, to take Canton's slot.
HOLLYWOOD - The joint Time Warner and Turner Broadcasting System merger will cause layoffs in overlapping areas, according to an internal memo distributed to employees of the companies.
HOLLYWOOD - Creative Artists Agency agent Ruth-Ann Huvane will join the Sony Pictures TV arm as senior vice president of talent.
